svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 13, 2024" date: "2024-01-12"
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming
using Goerli client releases Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed
Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
‚Ä¢ Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb
Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS
Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS
‚Ä¢ Ephemery testnet upgrades to Dencun January 18
Ephemery testnet upgrades to Dencun January 18
‚Ä¢ Goerli testnet upgrades to Dencun January 17 Bug bounty doubled for Dencun specific vulnerabilities, up to $500k
Goerli testnet upgrades to Dencun January 17
‚Ä¢ Bug bounty doubled for Dencun specific vulnerabilities, up to $500k
Client releases for Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.6.0-rc.0 : pre-release Lodestar v1.14.0-rc.2 : pre-release Nimbus v24.1.1 Prysm v4.2.0 Teku v24.1.0
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.1.0 Erigon v2.56.2 Geth v1.13.10 Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support Reth v0.1.0-alpha.14
‚Ä¢ Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support
Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold Social action options to tackle a concentrated actor
üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Social action options to tackle a concentrated actor
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
‚Ä¢ Increasing gas limit debate: P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change Marius van der Wijden: risks include
missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs Vitalik: modest increase is reasonable
‚Ä¢ P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
‚Ä¢ Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity
Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity
‚Ä¢ Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
‚Ä¢ Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
‚Ä¢ Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
‚Ä¢ Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
‚Ä¢ Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
‚Ä¢ EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability across rollups, Lido, security
budget, capping signatures to 8192 per slot, gas limit increase, native (enshrined) rollups, EigenLayer, MEV burn & EIP7251 (increase max
EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability across rollups, Lido, security budget,
capping signatures to 8192 per slot, gas limit increase, native (enshrined) rollups, EigenLayer, MEV burn & EIP7251 (increase max
‚Ä¢ Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
‚Ä¢ Proposals for relay incentivization : low-latency relay mesh network and enshrining missed slot penalty on proposers
‚Ä¢ OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0), reduces rate of basefee change & adds
OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0), reduces rate of basefee change & adds
‚Ä¢ RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP precompile addresses) discussion and
RIP working groups (precompiles, EIP4844 testing & fee markets)
RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP precompile addresses) discussion and RIP
working groups (precompiles, EIP4844 testing & fee markets)
‚Ä¢ EIPs EIP7591 : BLS signed transactions EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification EIP7594 : PeerDAS (peer data availability
‚Ä¢ EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7589 : Semi-fungible token roles ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs ERC7593 : NFT synthetic evidence
‚Ä¢ ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs
ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs
‚Ä¢ Remix v0.40.0 : Ape framework Vyper compiler, Uniswap v4 templates & Circom v2.1.6
Remix v0.40.0 : Ape framework Vyper compiler, Uniswap v4 templates & Circom v2.1.6
‚Ä¢ GasliteNFT (ERC721 base contract): extends ERC721A with Ownable2Step & MerkeProofLib
GasliteNFT (ERC721 base contract): extends ERC721A with Ownable2Step & MerkeProofLib
‚Ä¢ Evm-inspectors : Revm Inspectors for Parity & Geth style traces and JS Inspector
Evm-inspectors : Revm Inspectors for Parity & Geth style traces and JS Inspector
‚Ä¢ Wevm Vocs : React-based static documentation generator, content in Markdown or MDX
Wevm Vocs : React-based static documentation generator, content in Markdown or MDX
‚Ä¢ Wise Lending ~177 ETH exploit via precision issue
Wise Lending ~177 ETH exploit via precision issue
‚Ä¢ Behind the scenes of Euler March 2023 exploit & fund recovery
Behind the scenes of Euler March 2023 exploit & fund recovery
‚Ä¢ Optimism‚Äôs RetroPGF round 3 results , 30M OP allocated to 501 builders & creators
‚Ä¢ Unicef Rwanda using staking to fund school internet connectivity
Unicef Rwanda using staking to fund school internet connectivity
‚Ä¢ X (Twitter) removed NFT profile picture support
X (Twitter) removed NFT profile picture support
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.2 to 483.5 gwei, with 26.2 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei 3.2k ETH net burn
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.2 to 483.5 gwei, with 26.2 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
‚Ä¢ USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
‚Ä¢ OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy
OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy
‚Ä¢ Simon de la Rouviere See You There : 1 of 1 NFT, records holders over 5 years
Simon de la Rouviere See You There : 1 of 1 NFT, records holders over 5 years
‚Ä¢ Speedtracer (daily mini game) live on Base, trace a race track & mint highest score
Speedtracer (daily mini game) live on Base, trace a race track & mint highest score
‚Ä¢ Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
‚Ä¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
‚Ä¢ SEC approves BTC ETFs Commissioner Peirce : ‚Äúsquandered a decade of opportunities‚Äù SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone
‚Ä¢ Commissioner Peirce : ‚Äúsquandered a decade of opportunities‚Äù
Commissioner Peirce : ‚Äúsquandered a decade of opportunities‚Äù
‚Ä¢ SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone number without 2FA
SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone number without 2FA
‚Ä¢ New York DFS settles with Genesis for compliance failures, $8M penalty & cease operations in the state
New York DFS settles with Genesis for compliance failures, $8M penalty & cease operations in the state
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in
‚Ä¢ Jan 15 ‚Äì EF‚Äôs Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
Jan 15 ‚Äì EF‚Äôs Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
‚Ä¢ Jan 17 ‚Äì Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 231680, livestream

‚Ä¢ Jan 30 ‚Äì Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
Jan 30 ‚Äì Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
‚Ä¢ Feb 2-4 ‚Äì ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)

‚Ä¢ Feb 7 ‚Äì Hole≈°ky testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 29696 (assuming no issues)
